mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dflix.cinema WHERE copenDate BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 WEEK) OR crank < 11 ORDER BY crank IS NULL, CAST(crank AS UNSIGNED) ASC
SELECT theater.*, screenhall.* FROM screenhall INNER JOIN theater ON theater.tno = screenhall.tno WHERE theater.tno = #{tno}

SELECT theater.*, screenhall.*, s.*, c.cno, c.cname FROM screenhall INNER JOIN theater ON theater.tno = screenhall.tno INNER JOIN screen s ON screenhall.shallno = s.shallno INNER JOIN cinema c ON c.cno = s.cno WHERE theater.tno = #{tno} AND s.sday = #{sday} ORDER BY s.sno;
